009package imagingbook.common.color.sets;
010
011import java.awt.Color;
012import java.util.Objects;
013
014/**
015 * Interface used for color enum types.
016 *
017 * @author WB
018 */
019public interface ColorEnumeration {
020
021        /**
022         * Returns the enum item's {@link Color}. Example:
023         * <pre>
024         * Color c = BasicAwtColor.Blue.getColor();</pre>
025         *
026         * @return the item's AWT {@link Color}
027         */
028        public Color getColor();
029
030        /**
031         * Returns an array of colors defined by the specified {@link ColorEnumeration} enum class.
032         * <pre>
033         * Color[] colors = ColorEnumeration.getColors(BasicAwtColor.class);</pre>
034         *
035         * @param clazz a {@link ColorEnumeration} enum class
036         * @return a {@link Color} array
037         */
038        public static Color[] getColors(Class<? extends ColorEnumeration> clazz) {
039                if (!clazz.isEnum()) {
040                        throw new RuntimeException(ColorEnumeration.class.getSimpleName() + 
041                                        " may only be implemented by enum types!");
042                }
043                ColorEnumeration[] colorItems = clazz.getEnumConstants(); 
044                Objects.requireNonNull(colorItems);
045                return getColors(colorItems);
046        }
047
048        /**
049         * Returns a color subset as an array of colors for the specified {@link ColorEnumeration} items. Example:
050         * <pre>
051         * Color[] colors = ColorEnumeration.getColors(BasicAwtColor.Blue, BasicAwtColor.Green);</pre>
052         *
053         * @param cols a sequence of {@link ColorEnumeration} items
054         * @return a {@link Color} array
055         */
056        public static Color[] getColors(ColorEnumeration... cols) {
057                Color[] colors = new Color[cols.length];
058                for (int i = 0; i < cols.length; i++) {
059                        colors[i] = cols[i].getColor();
060                }
061                return colors;
062        }
063
064        /**
065         * Searches for the specified AWT {@link Color} in the given {@link ColorEnumeration}. If a matching color is found,
066         * the associated enum item is returned, {@code null} otherwise.
067         *
068         * @param col some AWT {@link Color}
069         * @param clazz a {@link ColorEnumeration} enum class
070         * @return a {@link ColorEnumeration} instance or {@code null}
071         */
072        public static ColorEnumeration findColor(Color col, Class<? extends ColorEnumeration> clazz) {
073                ColorEnumeration[] colorItems = clazz.getEnumConstants();
074                for (ColorEnumeration ce : colorItems) {
075                        if (col.equals(ce.getColor())) {
076                                return ce;
077                        }
078                }
079                return null;
080        }
081        
082}
